com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server
Class AbstractHostingTechnology

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.AbstractHostingTechnology
Direct Known Subclasses:
NCFHostingTechnology, WebServiceHostingTechnology
public abstract class AbstractHostingTechnology
extends java.lang.Object

Base class of all service hosting technologies.
The publishing engine creates and disposed the service instance, however, the hosting technology is responsible for publishing a given service instance. Each derived implementation needs a public constructor with the arguments IPublishingEngine engine, String name, ParameterSet description that is called by the publishing engine.
